Chapter Previous Next

class gstBoundaryCube : public gstBoundary

Bounding cube boundary class. This restricts the PHANToM inside a box-shaped volume. The box is by default located at the origin with the width along the X-axis, height along the Y-axis, and depth (length) along the Z-axis.

From header file: gstBoundaryCube.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstBoundaryCubeConstructor.
gstBoundaryCubeCopy Constructor.
~gstBoundaryCubeDestructor.
Functions
CloneBoundaryCube
getHeight Get height (Y-axis) of boundary [millimeters].
getLength Get depth/length (Z-axis) of boundary [millimeters].
getWidth Get width (X-axis) of boundary [millimeters].
setHeight Set height (Y-axis) of boundary [millimeters].
setLength Set depth/length (Z-axis) of boundary [millimeters].
setWidth Set width (X-axis) of boundary [millimeters].
getClassTypeId Static: get type id of this class.
staticIsOfType Return TRUE if class is of the given type or is derived from that type.
Virtual Functions
CloneClone.
checkIfPointIsInside_WCFor internal use.
collisionDetectFor extension: Returns TRUE if a line drawn from the previous to the current position of the PHANToM intersects the boundary.
getTypeIdVirtual form of getClassTypeId.
intersectionFor extension: Checks to see if line segment intersects the box boundary.
